text: satyavisvasikaleyum satyavisvasinikaleyum, avarute prakasam avarute munbhagannaliluteyum valatubhagannaliluteyum sancarikkunna nilayil ni kanunna divasam! (annavareat parayappetum:) innu ninnalkkulla santeasavartta cila svargatteappukale parriyakunnu. avayute talbhagattu kuti aruvikal olukikeantirikkum. ninnal atil nityavasikalayirikkum. at mahattaya bhagyam tanneyanâ€Œ
